2.1. Module pyd1.d1client¶

Created:20100111
Author:vieglais
class pyd1.d1client.D1Client(introspection_target='http://cn.dataone.org/', cache=None, timeout=None, proxy_info=None)¶

Implements a basic client for interaction with the DataONE system.

Example:

>>> from pyd1 import d1client
>>> target = "http://localhost:8000/mn"
>>> cli = d1client.D1Client()
>>> objects = cli.listObjects(target=target, count=10)
>>> objects.keys()
[u'count', u'start', u'total', u'data']
>>> objects['count']
10
>>> print objects['data'][0]
{u'guid': u'02c3f67e-b2e1-4550-8fae-f6d90e9f15f6', 
 u'hash': u'2e01e17467891f7c933dbaa00e1459d23db3fe4f', 
 u'modified': u'2010-01-06T12:44:26', u'oclass': u'data', u'size': 2}
>>> cli.get(objects['data'][0]['guid'], target=target)
'49'
>>> sysm = cli.getSystemMetadata(objects['data'][0]['guid'], target=target)
>>> dir(sysm)
['AccessRule', 'AuthoritativeMemberNode', 'Checksum', 'ChecksumAlgorthm', 
 'Created', 'DerivedFrome', 'DescribedBy', 'Describes', 'EmbargoExpires', 
 'Expires', 'Identifier', 'ObjectFormat', 'ObsoletedBy', 'Obsoletes', 
 'OriginMemberNode', 'Replica', 'RightsHolder', 'Size', 'Submitter', 
 'SysMetadataCreated', 'SysMetadataModified', '__class__', '__delattr__', 
 '__dict__', '__doc__', '__format__', '__getattribute__', '__hash__', 
 '__init__', '__module__', '__new__', '__reduce__', '__reduce_ex__', 
 '__repr__', '__setattr__', '__sizeof__', '__str__', '__subclasshook__', 
 '__weakref__', '_getValues', '_parse', 'etree', 'isValid', 'toXml', 'xmldoc']
>>> sysm.Size
2
>>> sysm.created
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
AttributeError: 'D1SystemMetadata' object has no attribute 'created'
>>> sysm.Created
datetime.datetime(2010, 1, 6, 12, 44, 26)
Parameters:
  • introspection_target – Location of a service for discovering information about the DataONE system, such as the locations of resolvers, coordinating nodes and member nodes.
  • cache – Either the name of a directory to be used as a flat file cache, or it must an object that implements httlib2.FileCache interface
  • timeout – Socket level timeout (seconds)
  • proxy_info – httplib2.ProxyInfo instance
get(guid, target=None)¶

Returns the bytes of an object retrieved from the DataONE system. If a target is not provided, then the location of the object is resolved first, and the bytes are retrieved from the resolved target.

Note that the resulting object may be quite large. If this is a concern, then check the system metadata for the object first.

Parameters:
  • guid – The globally unique identifier for the object
  • target – Optional host from which to retrieve the object.
Return type:

(Bytes) The bytes of the object.
getObjectMetadataURL(target, guid)¶

Given a host and object identifier, return a URL that can be used to retrieve the system metadata about the object.

Parameters:
  • target – The host to which the request is being sent.
  • guid – The GUID for the object
Return type:

URL for retrieving the system metadata about the object
getObjectURL(target, guid)¶

Given a host and object identifier, return a URL that can be used to retrieve the object.

Parameters:
  • target – The host (e.g. http://mn1.dataone.org/base/)
  • guid – The GUID for the object
Return type:

URL to retrieve the object bytes
getObjectsURL(target, start=None, count=None, oclass=None)¶

Returns the path of the objects collection for the specified target.

Parameters:
  • target – The URL of the service from which the collection is being retrieved.
  • start – Zero based index of the first object to retrieve.
  • count – Maximum number of objects to be retrieved.
  • oclass – The type of object being requested.
Return type:

URL for retrieving the specified content.
getSystemMetadata(guid, target=None)¶

Retrieve the DataONE system metadata describing the specified object.

Parameters:
  • guid – The globally unique identifier for the object
  • target – Optional host from which to retrieve the object.
Return type:

(SystemMetadata) instance representing the object’s system metadata
getSystemMetadataSchema()¶

Convenience function to retrieve the system metadata schema document.

Return type:(Unicode) The system metadata document schema.
lastResponse()¶

Returns the last response metadata returned from a Http request.

Return type:httplib2.Response
listObjects(target='http://cn.dataone.org/', start=0, count=100, oclass=None)¶

Retrieves a list of objects available on target.

Parameters:
  • target – The host being queried. If none provided then objects from the DataONE root are listed, which should be a list of all objects in the DataONE system.
  • start – Zero based index for first item to retrieve
  • count – Number of items to retrieve
  • oclass – Optional restriction for type of object to retrieve
Return type:

(D1ObjectList) List of objects (guid, oclass, hash, modified, size)
Raises:

TargetNotAvailableException
request(*args, **kwargs)¶

An oversight in httplib2 Http.request() means that when connecting to a valid host that isn’t connectable, the conn object within the Http class is not tested for None before calling httplib. This results in httplib raising an attribute error, which is a bit confusing. Here the error is trapped and re-raised as a Httplib2.HttpLib2Error.

The _last_response instance variable is updated.

Return type:Tuple of Response and data returned from the Http request
resolve(guid)¶

Given an identifier, returns a list of URLs from which the object may be retrieved. In general, the first list entry is the preferred retrieval option.

Parameter:guid – Globally unique identifier known to the DataONE system.
